title: Abstract Series
description: A bold exploration of form, color, and texture through abstract photography. This collection challenges conventional perspectives and invites viewers to find their own meaning.

photos.title: Color Study #1
photos.description: An exploration of color relationships and emotional responses

photos.title: Form and Void
photos.description: Examining the relationship between positive and negative space

photos.title: Texture Exploration
photos.description: A detailed study of natural and artificial textures

photos.title: Movement in Stillness
photos.description: Capturing the impression of motion through static elements

photos.title: Light Study
photos.description: Exploring how light interacts with different surfaces and materials
